alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 3:16AM EST until November 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Storm total snow amounts of 2 to 6 inches, with the highest totals in the eastern Adirondacks and southern Green Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In New York, The southern Adirondacks and the Lake George Saratoga Region. In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In southern Vermont, Bennington and Western Windham Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wintry mix of snow and freezing rain will be changing over to plain rain by daybreak. Rain will be tapering off by mid-morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
